creator: anup.mittal@mphasis.com
text:
Hello,

I have checked up in the bugzilla data base and I could not find the exact 
reason of this bug so am reporting here.

As part of porting activity from Linux to Unix of my product which uses Apache 
web server I have successfully built the apache web images and done the 
installation.

However after starting Apache images I get my web page .
As part of my product I have enabled backward compatibilty in my modules.

When I click on the link which should take me to the page I get the follwoing 
error::

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
------------------------------------
Proxy Error
The proxy server received an invalid response from an upstream server.
The proxy server could not handle the request GET /WEBAGENT/INDEX.TPL.
 
Reason: Error reading from remote server
 
________________________________________________________________________________
__________________________________

I can send my conf file if needed thro which I am starting my apache images.

Please help me with any info or ideas.

Let me know in case of any other info required.

Thanks,
Anup Mittal

creator: trawick@apache.org
text: What messages are written to the Apache error log at that time?

creator: anup.mittal@mphasis.com
text:
There were no error messages reported in the Apache log files.

This partcular error message is part of the mod_proxy_http.c so though if 
anybody has come across such an issue.

Lot of the similar type of error is seen when googled but no concrete answer 
was seen.

please let me know in case of any particular info required from my side.

my conf file is as below

******************************************************************************
#
ServerRoot "/opt/hp/hpsmh"
PidFile logs/httpd.pid
Timeout 300
KeepAlive On
MaxKeepAliveRequests 100
KeepAliveTimeout 15
<IfModule worker.c>
StartServers         1
MaxClients          25
MinSpareThreads     25
MaxSpareThreads     25 
ThreadsPerChild     25
ServerLimit          1
MaxRequestsPerChild  0
</IfModule>
<IfModule perchild.c>
NumServers           5
StartThreads         5
MinSpareThreads      5
MaxSpareThreads     10
MaxThreadsPerChild  20
MaxRequestsPerChild  0
</IfModule>
<IfModule mpm_winnt.c>
ThreadsPerChild 250
MaxRequestsPerChild  0
</IfModule>
LoadModule access_module modules/mod_access.so
LoadModule actions_module modules/mod_actions.so
LoadModule alias_module modules/mod_alias.so
LoadModule cgi_module modules/mod_cgi.so
LoadModule dir_module modules/mod_dir.so
LoadModule env_module modules/mod_env.so
LoadModule imap_module modules/mod_imap.so
LoadModule log_config_module modules/mod_log_config.so
LoadModule mime_module modules/mod_mime.so
LoadModule proxy_module modules/mod_proxy.so
LoadModule proxy_connect_module modules/mod_proxy_connect.so
LoadModule proxy_http_module modules/mod_proxy_http.so
LoadModule negotiation_module modules/mod_negotiation.so
LoadModule rewrite_module modules/mod_rewrite.so
LoadModule setenvif_module modules/mod_setenvif.so
LoadModule headers_module modules/mod_headers.so
LoadModule smh_help_module modules/mod_smh_help.so
LoadModule php4_module modules/libphp4.so
<IfModule !mpm_winnt.c>

# If you wish httpd to run as a different user or group, you must run
# httpd as root initially and it will switch.  
#
User hpsmh
Group hpsmh
</IfModule>
UseCanonicalName Off

    AllowOverride None
#IP_RESTRICTION_BLOCK
</Directory>
DirectoryIndex index.html index.htm index.php
<Files ~ "^\.ht">

    Deny from all
</Files>

DefaultType text/plain
<IfModule mod_mime_magic.c>

</IfModule>
HostnameLookups Off
ErrorLog /opt/hp/hpsmh/logs/error_log
LogLevel error
LogFormat "%h %l %u %t \"%r\" %>s %b \"%{Referer}i\" \"%{User-Agent}i\"" 
combined
LogFormat "%h %l %u %t \"%r\" %>s %b" common
LogFormat "%{Referer}i -> %U" referer
LogFormat "%{User-agent}i" agent
CustomLog /opt/hp/hpsmh/logs/access_log common
ServerTokens min
ServerSignature Off
ScriptAlias /cgi-bin/ "/opt/hp/hpsmh/data/cgi-bin/"
AddEncoding x-compress Z
AddEncoding x-gzip gz tgz
AddLanguage da .dk
AddLanguage nl .nl
AddLanguage en .en

AddLanguage fr .fr
AddLanguage de .de

AddLanguage el .el
AddLanguage it .it

TW zh-CN
ForceLanguagePriority Prefer Fallback
AddCharset ISO-8859-1  .iso8859-1  .latin1
AddCharset ISO-8859-2  .iso8859-2  .latin2 .cen

AddCharset WINDOWS-1251 .cp-1251   .win-1251

AddCharset KOI8-r      .koi8-r .koi8-ru
AddCharset KOI8-ru     .koi8-uk .ua
AddCharset ISO-10646-UCS-2 .ucs2
AddCharset ISO-10646-UCS-4 .ucs4

BrowserMatch "Mozilla/2" nokeepalive

BrowserMatch "RealPlayer 4\.0" force-response-1.0
BrowserMatch "Java/1\.0" force-response-1.0
BrowserMatch "JDK/1\.0" force-response-1.0
BrowserMatch "Microsoft Data Access Internet Publishing Provider" redirect-
carefully
BrowserMatch "^WebDrive" redirect-carefully
BrowserMatch "^WebDAVFS/1.[012]" redirect-carefully
BrowserMatch "^gnome-vfs" redirect-carefully
ProxyRequests Off
<IfModule mod_proxy.c>
ProxyRequests Off
<Proxy *>
    Order deny,allow
    Deny from all
    Allow from all
</Proxy>
ProxyVia On
</IfModule>
<IfModule mod_rewrite.c>
RewriteEngine On
</IfModule>
listen 127.0.0.1:2301
<VirtualHost 127.0.0.1:2301>
ServerName 127.0.0.1:2301
ProxyRequests Off
DocumentRoot "/opt/hp/hpsmh/data/isdocs"
<Directory "/opt/hp/hpsmh/data/isdocs">
    Options MultiViews
    Options +FollowSymLinks
    AllowOverride None
</Directory>
RewriteEngine On
RewriteRule ^/cpqlogin.htm /red2301.html
RewriteMap map1 txt:/opt/hp/hpsmh/conf/hmmolist.map
RewriteCond %{REQUEST_URI} ^/([^/]+).*
RewriteCond ${map1:%1|NONE} ^(http.*) [NC]
RewriteRule ^(/.*) %1$1 [P]
RewriteCond %{REQUEST_URI} ^/Proxy/LookupTag/(.*)
RewriteCond ${map1:%1|NONE} ^(http.*) [NC]
RewriteRule ^(/.*) %1$1 [P]
RewriteCond %{REQUEST_URI} ^/Proxy/TranslateTag/(.*)
RewriteCond ${map1:%1|NONE} ^(http.*) [NC]
RewriteRule ^(/.*) %1$1 [P]
ProxyPreserveHost on
Header set Server: CompaqHTTPServer/9.9
<Location /Proxy/XEStatusReport>
SetHandler smh_config_handler
</Location>
<Location /proxy/xestatusreport>
SetHandler smh_config_handler
</Location>
<Location /Proxy/Registration>
SetHandler smh_bc_handler
</Location>
<Location /Proxy/Reconnect>
SetHandler smh_bc_handler
</Location>
<Location /Proxy/GetHMMOs>
SetHandler smh_bc_handler
</Location>
<Location /navfile.htm>
SetHandler smh_bc_handler
</Location>
</VirtualHost>

AddType application/x-x509-ca-cert .crt

SSLPassPhraseDialog  builtin

listen 127.0.0.1:2381
<VirtualHost 127.0.0.1:2381>
ServerName 127.0.0.1:2381
ProxyRequests Off
DocumentRoot "/opt/hp/hpsmh/data/htdocs"
<Directory "/opt/hp/hpsmh/data/htdocs">
    Options +MultiViews
    AllowOverride None
</Directory>
<Directory "/opt/hp/hpsmh/data/cgi-bin">
    Options +MultiViews
    AllowOverride None
    AddHandler cgi-script cgi exe hpq
</Directory>
<Location /proxy/smhstatus>
SetHandler smh_config_handler
</Location>
RewriteEngine On
RewriteRule ^/cpqlogin.htm /cpqlogin.php
RewriteMap map1 txt:/opt/hp/hpsmh/conf/hmmolist.map
RewriteCond %{REQUEST_URI} ^/([^/]+).*
RewriteCond ${map1:%1|NONE} ^(http.*) [NC]
RewriteRule ^(/.*) %1$1 [P]
RewriteCond %{REQUEST_URI} ^/Proxy/LookupTag/(.*)
RewriteCond ${map1:%1|NONE} ^(http.*) [NC]
RewriteRule ^(/.*) %1$1 [P]
RewriteCond %{REQUEST_URI} ^/Proxy/TranslateTag/(.*)
RewriteCond ${map1:%1|NONE} ^(http.*) [NC]
RewriteRule ^(/.*) %1$1 [P]
ProxyPreserveHost on
<Location /proxy/smhui/*>
SetHandler smh_ui_handler
</Location>
<Location /cimom>
SetHandler smh_config_handler
</Location>
<Location /Proxy/configui>
SetHandler smh_config_handler
</Location>
<Location /proxy/GetSMHData>
SetHandler smh_config_handler
</Location>
<Location /proxy/SetSMHData>
SetHandler smh_config_handler
</Location>
<Location /proxy/AddXECert>
SetHandler smh_config_handler
</Location>
<Location /proxy/smhimp_c.htm>
SetHandler pkcs-handler
</Location>
<Location /proxy/smhgen_c.htm>
SetHandler pkcs-handler
</Location>
<Location /Proxy/GetHMMOs>
SetHandler smh_bc_handler
</Location>
<Location /navfile.htm>
SetHandler smh_bc_handler
</Location>
SSLEngine on
SSLCipherSuite ALL:!ADH:!EXPORT56:RC4+RSA:+HIGH:+MEDIUM:+LOW:+SSLv2:+EXP:+eNULL
SSLCertificateFile /opt/hp/sslshare/cert.pem
SSLCertificateKeyFile /opt/hp/sslshare/file.pem
<Files ~ "\.(hpq|exe|cgi|shtml|phtml|php3?)$">
    SSLOptions +StdEnvVars
</Files>
<Directory "/opt/hp/hpsmh/cgi-bin">
    SSLOptions +StdEnvVars
</Directory>
Alias /hphelp "/opt/hp/hpsmh/data/help"
<Directory "/opt/hp/hpsmh/data/help">
     Options ExecCGI MultiViews
     AllowOverride None
     Order allow,deny
     Allow from all
     SSLOptions +StdEnvVars
     AddHandler cgi-script cgi exe hpq
</Directory>
<Location /help>
    # The smh_help_handler requires the /hphelp Alias defined above...
    # It also catches the "?topic=" & "?query=" query string values 
    SetHandler smh_help_handler
</Location>
SetEnvIf User-Agent ".*MSIE.*" \
         nokeepalive ssl-unclean-shutdown \
         downgrade-1.0 force-response-1.0
</VirtualHost>

creator: chip@force-elite.com
text:
Can you attempt to capture the request that Apache sent to the backend, and what
the reply is with tcpdump?

creator: nick@webthing.com
text:
No response from originator, but Looks like 37770.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 37770 ***
